name: 李俊賢
objective:
Matlab/Simulink的操作使用、動態系統建模與分析、時域響應分析、頻域響應分析、控制器設計、狀態空間設計法、離散時間控制系統；
實例探討、書報研讀。
schedule:
Week 1: 課程簡介與安全手則
Week 2: Matlab的基本操作 (Ch. 1)
Week 3: Simulink: Quick Start (Ch. 2)
Week 4: Simulink: Modeling (Ch. 3)
Week 5: Simulink: Simulation & Analysis (Ch. 4-6)
Week 6: Dynamic Systems Modeling (Ch. 7)
Week 7: Time-Domain Analysis (Ch. 8)
Week 8: Frequency-Domain Analysis (Ch. 9)
Week 9: Controller Design (Ch. 10)
Week 10: State-Space Approach (Ch. 11)
Week 11: Discrete-Time Control Systems (Ch. 12)
Week 12-18: Special Projects: 專題實作 (含簡報、demo、與報告)
scorePolicy: 實習操作與報告：60%、專題實作：30%、出席：10%
materials: Textbook:，李宜達編著，控制系統設計與模擬：使用MATLAB/SIMULINK (修訂六版)，全華圖書、2009。
